definitions.title: n.pl.
definitions.body: (a) fifty (Ar. xamsuwna Aram. h.am4iyn, Ph. [[חמשם]]; MI:28 [[חמשן]]; As. ḫamšâti Di in Lotz:TP 80)—[[חֲמִשִּׁים]] Ge 6:15 + 154 t. (incl. Ez Eze 40:25, Eze 40:29, Eze 40:33, del. Co) + Ez Eze 45:12 (so rd. A Hi Co for [[חמּשׁה]]); sf. [[חֲמִשֶּׁיךָ]] 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:12, [[חֲמִשָּׁיו]] 2Ki 1:9 + 4 t., [[חֲמִשֵּׁיהֶם]] 2Ki 1:14; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a fifty, a company of fifty Ex 18:21, Ex 18:25, De 1:15, 1Sa 8:12, 2Ki 1:9, 2Ki 1:9 + 13 t. 2Ki 1 (in v:2Ki 1:14 = fifties), Is 3:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: elsewhere, without noun expr., (1) without other numeral Nu 31:30, Nu 31:47, Ez Eze 27:18, Eze 27:18, Hag 2:16; (2) with other num. ´[[ח]] preceding Ex 30:23, Ex 30:23 + 11 t.; + 1Ch 12:34 Baer, van d. H. v:1Ch 12:33 (sq. [[אלף]]); (3) ´[[ח]] following Ex 38:26 + 10 t.; (4) ´[[ח]] between other num. Nu 1:23 + 23 t.
´[[ח]] = ordinal, fiftieth Le 25:10, Le 25:11, 2Ki 15:23, cf. v:2Ki 15:27.
